R

RecipeMap<T extends java.lang.Comparable> - Class in alston.minecraft
Used as a generic data structure for any recipies, which requires an array of type T extends Comparable, which maps to a single type T and the Class of U, a type that represents nothing.
RecipeMap(Class) - Constructor for class alston.minecraft.RecipeMap
Creates a new RecipieMap by storing a refrence to the type U's class, and initiating all other Objects.
release() - Method in class alston.minecraft.Window
User released on the inventory menu.
remove(int, int) - Method in class alston.minecraft.SlotArea
Removes the Item at the specified coordinates from the inventory, removes all the refrences to it so it can be eligible for Garbage Collection, then replaces it with a new EmptyItem.
removePernamentLight(Light) - Static method in class alston.minecraft.Light
Removes a pernament light.
resetHealth() - Method in class alston.minecraft.Block
Resets the health of the Block to the protoype's.
restore() - Method in class alston.minecraft.Block
Restores the Block's memory intensive Objects (Spatial and Material); called to de-compress when LOADING A CHUNK.
restore() - Method in class alston.minecraft.Chunk
Restores the chunk's node and controls.
restore() - Method in class alston.minecraft.Inventory
Restores the inventory bar and menu to the inventoryNode.
restore(Node) - Method in class alston.minecraft.SlotArea
Restores the SlotArea's Items and transient fields.
restoreSpatials() - Static method in class alston.minecraft.Item
Restores all the Spatials of items in the scene graph.
